name: io.github.gigabrain-observer/google-docs-mcp-server
title: Google Docs
description: Google Docs MCP server with full tab support, markdown extraction, and batch updates.

environmentVariables.description: Path to the Google service account JSON key file
environmentVariables.name: SERVICE_ACCOUNT_PATH

environmentVariables.description: Email of the Workspace user to impersonate via domain-wide delegation
environmentVariables.name: SUBJECT_EMAIL
